item.title: Why No One Should Trust The Weiss Cryptocurrency Ratings
item.description: Weiss Ratings are on the receiving end of severe crypto community backlash after releasing their Weiss Cryptocurrency Ratings. It’s an ambitious task, for sure, to attempt to rate cryptocurrencies as current conditions make it akin to rating penny stocks — anything can happen. However, it is also a dangerous task. Not for them, of course, but for the consumers, investors, and institutions that will pay for their “research” and use it to inform their investment decisions.

item.title: Bringing Blockchain Back to the Bare Basics
